tool_description: Enter a site URL and extract its meta tags, social media tags, h content, and body content as text. Also provides a SEO Score based on meta tags included or missing. If a tag is missing it will return the result none for that tag.
name: Seo Meta Tag Search
title: Seo Meta Tag Search

api_list.name: Import URL
api_list.description: Pass in the url to be imported and meta tags extracted, e.g: https://bing.com/ Must contain the http or https and be a valid url or will return null. This data will be cached unless force is passed in.
